statements: SELECT * FROM billing_and_payments;
SELECT user_id, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payments;
SELECT ride_id, payment_status FROM billing_and_payments;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payments ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, ride_id, payment_status FROM billing_and_payments WHERE payment_status='PAID';
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, ride_id FROM billing_and_payments WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT user_id, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payments WHERE billing_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payments WHERE payment_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, ride_id, payment_status FROM billing_and_payments WHERE ride_id IS NOT NULL AND payment_status != 'CANCELLED';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_type = 'customer';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, ride_start, ride_end, distance FROM rides WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT ride_id, amount FROM rides WHERE ride_end IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rides FROM rides WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT user_id, ride_start, ride_end FROM rides WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY ride_start ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_type FROM users ORDER BY user_type;
SELECT user_name, email, phone_number FROM users;
SELECT ride_id, user_id, pickup_location, dropoff_location, ride_distance FROM rides;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE signup_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount, payment_status FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT ride_id, ride_duration, ride_cost FROM rides WHERE ride_cost > 50;
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE ride_distance > 10 ORDER BY ride_cost DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ride_id, user_id, pickup_location, dropoff_location, ride_duration FROM rides WHERE ride_cost BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT user_name, email, payment_date, amount FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT user_name, payment_date, ride_cost FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id JOIN rides ON rides.ride_id = payments.ride_id WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM billing_customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM billing_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount, due_date FROM billing_invoices WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM billing_customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM billing_transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM billing_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT billing_customers.customer_name, billing_transactions.amount, billing_transactions.transaction_date FROM billing_customers JOIN billing_transactions ON billing_customers.customer_id = billing_transactions.customer_id WHERE billing_transactions.amount > 100;

SELECT billing_invoices.invoice_id, billing_invoices.total_amount, billing_customers.customer_name, billing_customers.email_address FROM billing_invoices JOIN billing_customers ON billing_invoices.customer_id = billing_customers.customer_id WHERE billing_invoices.due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(ride_distance) AS avg_distance, SUM(ride_duration) AS total_duration FROM usage_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_duration > 5000 ORDER BY avg_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM AutonomousVehicles LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_color FROM AutonomousVehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY vehicle_color DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ride_id, start_time, end_time FROM Rides WHERE total_distance > 10 ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount >= 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM AutonomousVehicles LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM AutonomousVehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 50;
SELECT vehicle_color, COUNT(*) FROM AutonomousVehicles GROUP BY vehicle_color;
SELECT * FROM Rides JOIN AutonomousVehicles ON Rides.vehicle_id = AutonomousVehicles.vehicle_id WHERE total_distance > 100;
SELECT U.user_id, P.payment_amount FROM Users U JOIN PaymentHistory P ON U.user_id = P.billing_id WHERE P.payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
